attributes.action: Award an Honour to Nigel Farage for his political work.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has been  a radical crusader in persuading the UK to pull out of the European Union, all without having a seat in the British Parliament.Without his efforts Britain would probably still have remained part of the EU.His single minded campaigning has radically altered UK political scene.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
